title: Japanese i6 Engine Sounds
description: Game ready, seamlessly looping sound clips of two different Japanese i6 engines. Ideal sound pack for a street racing games, sport cars and racecars. Comes with pre-made fmod sound bank.
longDescription:
Game ready, seamlessly looping sound clips of two Japanese i6 engine.

Ideal engine sound pack for street racing games, sport cars and racecars. All sound files are game ready, professionally recorded and seamlessly looped. Contain computer generated sounds.

Product comes with a pre-made Fmod sound bank.


Demo video: https://youtu.be/TfTAmCXAUJc


Read here the documentation: Documentation.pdf

Tutorial video for implementing Fmod car sound into UE 5: https://youtu.be/wo3kNR-WRQQ

List of sound clips:

  • startup: engine startup sound
  • engine_off: turning off engine sound
  • idle: engine's idle sound
  • idle_low_off: engine sound between idle and low rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • idle_low_on: engine sound between idle and low rpms when gas pedal is pressed
  • low_off: engine sound at low rpm sound when gas pedal is not pressed
  • low_on: engine sound at low rpm sound when gas pedal is pressed
  • low_med_off: engine sound between low and medium rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • low_med_on: engine sound between low and medium rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • med_off: engine sound at medium rpm sound when gas pedal is not pressed
  • med_on: engine sound at medium rpm sound when gas pedal is pressed
  • med_high_off: engine sound between medium and high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • med_high_on: engine sound between medium and high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • high_off: engine sound at high rpm sound when gas pedal is not pressed
  • high_on: engine sound at high rpm sound when gas pedal is pressed
  • very_high_off: engine sound at very high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • very_high_on: engine sound at very high rpms when gas pedal is not pressed
  • maxRPM: engine sound at maximum rpm limiter sound
  • aggressiveness_off_fx: extra sound clip for changing the engine sound's "aggressiveness" when gas pedal is not pressed - read the documentation to learn more about this sfx
  • aggressiveness_on_fx: extra sound clip for changing the engine sound's "aggressiveness" when gas pedal is pressed - read the documentation to learn more about this sfx

These sound clips are also exist in "interior" version, these interior sound clips are made for that case when the player is sitting inside the vehicle.


If you have suggestions or problems, feel free to contact me in Email, Facebook, or fill out the contact form on my website.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Two complete engine sound packs (40 wav file per sound pack)
  • All wav files are seamlessly looped
  • Sounds are pre-recorded for both exterior and interior camera views
  • Pre recorded off load sounds
  • Pre recorded "aggressiveness sfx" sound - ideal for simulating engine / exhaust upgrade or when the car lost it's muffler
  • 80 wav files: sound clips for interior and exterior camera views + start / stop engine SFX + aggressiveness SFX
  • Fmod sample project

Number of Audio Waves: 80

Number of Audio Cues: 80

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 2:12

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: Link

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Major update. All audio files has been remastered, re-recorded.
44 new audio clips has been added, other sound clips are remastered or re-recorded.
